DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Order Date and Time Sentinel CDM Laboratory Test Order Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something._An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen._Date that the test was ordered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created manually based on BRIDG 5.1 for CDM. 8.27.18 mc. Change Property to Date and Time per definition in BRIGG 5.3.1

ValueDomain.preferredName: Sentinel CDM Laboratory Test Order Date
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date that the test was ordered.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
